clinical_study.brief_title: Noninvasive Assessment of Cerebral Oxygenation and Cardiac Function in Patients With Neurovascular Diseases
clinical_study.official_title: Noninvasive Assessment of Cerebral Oxygenation and Cardiac Function in Patients With Neurovascular Diseases

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences, India

clinical_study.source: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences, India

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective observational study will assess the regional cerebral oxygen saturation and cardiac output non-invasively in patients with subarachnoid hemorrhage during nimodipine administration for the prevention/management of cerebral vasospasm.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the cerebral oxygen saturation percentage measured using near infrared spectroscopy technology after administration of nimodipine
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline cerebral oxygen saturation at 30 minutes after administration of nimodipine

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the cardiac output measured using near NICOM technology after administration of nimodipine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline cardiac output at 30 and 240 minutes after administration of nimodipine
secondary_outcome.description: unit of measurement will be L/min

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the cerebral oxygen saturation percentage measured using near infrared spectroscopy technology after administration of nimodipine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline cerebral oxygen saturation at 240 minutes after administration of nimodipine

study_pop.textblock: aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage with cerebral vasospasm

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage
- potential or actual cerebral vasospasm
Exclusion Criteria:
- non-aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage
- outside the 4-21 day window after ictus
- peripheral deoxygenation
- contraindication for nimodipine administration

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences, India
